channel.title: SafeSquid on Tech Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in SafeSquid on Tech Notebook

item.title: SafeSquid: Setting Up a Content Filtering Proxy
item.description:
Protecting children from inappropriate internet content is important, which is why tools like SafeSquid were created. Here’s some documentation:

Documentation on Deploying A Content Filtering Proxy Server To Distribute Controlled Internet Access With SafeSquid
How To Set Up Internet Access Control And Internet Filtering With SafeSquid Proxy Server
How To Control Access To Unwanted Websites Using URL Blacklist With SafeSquid Proxy Server
How To Control Download Of Files And Mime Types In SafeSquid Proxy Server
How To Block Ads And Banners In SafeSquid Proxy Server
Enhance Security By Removing ActiveX Control Codes From Web Pages With SafeSquid Proxy Server
How To Block Cookies From Unwanted Websites With SafeSquid Proxy Server
How To Block WebPages Based On Keywords Or Phrases With SafeSquid Proxy Server
How To Control Or Block Instant Messengers With SafeSquid Proxy Server

item.title: SafeSquid: Coupling with ClamAV to Filter Viruses on Incoming Traffic
item.description:
SafeSquid coupled with ClamAV allows you to analyze incoming traffic to detect potential viruses. Here’s documentation on how to implement this:

Documentation on how to Set Up Gateway Level Virus Security With ClamAV And SafeSquid Proxy
